The type of the truststore file. It must be a valid truststore type such as "JKS" or "PKCS12".

This value is locally defined. It will not be altered when restoring a backup and will not be replicated in a cluster.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/delimitedFile/changeBufferSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Determines how much data to buffer in memory during update and delete queries using the delimited file driver. The minimum value is 0 bytes. The default value is 1048576 bytes (1 MB).

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/delimitedFile/createBackupFile
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Determines whether or not to back up the original file when committing inserts, updates, or deletes to delimited files. Backup files are created in the same directory as the original file. The default value is true.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/delimitedFile/defaultCharacterColumnSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default character column size. Unit is number of characters.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/delimitedFile/introspectFloppyDrives
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Determines whether or not to introspect files on drive A and drive B. The default value is false. This property is ignored on unix platforms.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/delimitedFile/maxValueLength
serverAttributeDef.annotation: When reading a value, this configuration parameter limits the number of characters that can be included in any single value. This provides protection against a missing closing delimiter that could then cause the delimited file reader to read the rest of the file into memory.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/delimitedFile/nullString
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Whenever the delimited file driver encounters a value that exactly matches this string, it will treat that value as a NULL value instead of as a string. The default value of '[NULL]' is the string that the Composite Server uses to represent NULL values when it writes CSV files.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/ldap/defaultCharacterColumnSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default character column size. Unit is number of characters.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/netezza/datashipKeepNzlogFile
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
Netezza driver generates log file for each nzload operation. If set to True all log files will be kept. If set to False no log file will be saved to disk.

This value is locally defined. It will not be altered when restoring a backup and will not be replicated in a cluster.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/netezza/datashipNzlogDir
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
The directory to save Netezza driver nzload log file. The default log dir for dataship is $CIS/tmp/dataship/netezza and for cache loading is $CIS/tmp/cacheloading/netezza/logs.

This value is locally defined. It will not be altered when restoring a backup and will not be replicated in a cluster.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/netezza/escapeCharacter
serverAttributeDef.annotation: The escape character to be used while exporting/importing the contents to/from a flat file. It defaults to '\'.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/oracle/introspectAllObjects
serverAttributeDef.annotation: In Oracle 8.1.7 there are many schema objects that have no use or meaning within the Server. If set to True all schema objects will be introspected. If set to False a filter will be applied to only return objects that are of use within the Server.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/oracle/performance/connectionTracing
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Enables end to end metrics on Oracle connections used by CIS.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/oracle/performance/enablePassThruOptimizations
serverAttributeDef.annotation: This setting controls whether we invoke ResultSet.fetchBytes() on Oracle result sets.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/oracle/pushOracleQueryHints
serverAttributeDef.annotation: This setting controls whether to push oracle query hints to Oracle data sources. Query hints occur immediately after the SELECT keyword, and must begin with --+ or /*+. Regular comments will be dropped. Composite will not validate the query hints, and Oracle ignores invalid query hints. Composite does not guarantee that the query hint will be pushed, as plan optimizations may cause the hint to be dropped.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/oracle/setSessionTimeZone
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Sets the time zone on Oracle connections to retrieve values for TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE data types.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/oracle/tableLimitForColumnIntrospection
serverAttributeDef.annotation: When Oracle data sources are introspected, the introspection batches a certain number of tables and issues a query to the data source to gather column information. Users can specify the maximum number of tables for such batch processing. Increasing this number would mean that less number of queries will be required to introspect all the columns in all the tables. Accordingly, the time to introspect all the columns in all the tables will be less. If this number is too small, more queries will be needed, and the introspection time will be longer.
serverAttributeDef.displayName: Table Limit for Each Column Introspection Batch

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/soap/importLegacyWSDLAsSoap
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Import the WSDL data source as a SOAP data source.
serverAttributeDef.displayName: Import the WSDL data source as a SOAP data source.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/soap/logAfterTubeExecute
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
List of tube names to enable log of soap message or set to ALL for all tubes.

Tube names could set to Terminal,Handler,Validation,MustUnderstand,Monitoring,Addressing,At,Rm,Mc,Security,PacketFilter,Transport,Customized.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/soap/logBeforeTubeExecute
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
List of tube names to enable log of soap message or set to ALL for all tubes.

Tube names could set to Terminal,Handler,Validation,MustUnderstand,Monitoring,Addressing,At,Rm,Mc,Security,PacketFilter,Transport,Customized.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/sqlserver/datashipBcpPath
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
The absolute file path of the Microsoft BCP utility.

This value is locally defined. It will not be altered when restoring a backup and will not be replicated in a cluster.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/sqlserver/datashipBcpThreshold
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
Import/Export table data to SQL Server using BCP utility for each DataShip request, if row number exceeds this threshold.

This value is locally defined. It will not be altered when restoring a backup and will not be replicated in a cluster.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/sqlserver/performance/enablePassThruOptimizations
serverAttributeDef.annotation: This setting controls whether we invoke ResultSet.fetchBytes() on Microsoft Sql Server 2005 and 2008 result sets. This feature has no affect on Microsoft Sql Server 2000

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/sybase/ignoreMicroseconds
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Ignore microseconds in TIMESTAMP values.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/sybase/reIntrospectOnResAdd
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Re-Introspect and update all resources when adding a new resource.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/teradata/datashipFastThreshold
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
Import/Export table data to Teradata database using FastLoad/FastExport for each DataShip request, if row number exceeds this threshold.

This value is locally defined. It will not be altered when restoring a backup and will not be replicated in a cluster.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/transformation/defaultBinaryColumnSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default binary column size. Unit is number of bytes.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/transformation/defaultCharacterColumnSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default character column size. Unit is number of characters.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/transformation/defaultDecimalPrecision
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default decimal precision. Unit is number of digits.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/transformation/defaultDecimalScale
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default decimal scale. Unit is number of digits.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/transformation/streamBufferSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: The maximum number of rows the streaming transformation can buffer.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/xmlFile/introspectFloppyDrives
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Determines whether or not to introspect files on drive A and drive B. The default value is false. This property is ignored on unix platforms.

serverAttributeDef.name: /sources/xmlHttp/defaultInputParameterSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: Default input parameter size. Unit is number of characters.

serverAttributeDef.name: /studio/data/cursorFetchLimit
serverAttributeDef.annotation: This value affects how many rows can be fetched by Studio when looking at the results for a SQL request or procedure output.

serverAttributeDef.name: /studio/data/rowFetchSize
serverAttributeDef.annotation: When a query is executed from the Studio, this setting determines the number of rows to fetch and display.

serverAttributeDef.name: /studio/data/xmlTextLimit
serverAttributeDef.annotation: When a xml query is executed from the Studio, this setting determines the number of characters to fetch and display.

serverAttributeDef.name: /studio/lock/enabled
serverAttributeDef.annotation:
When Studio Locking is enabled, Studio users must acquire a resource lock before modifying those resources.

When Studio Locking Enabled is set to False, locks are optional for developers modifying resources.
